<h3 id="X15844">X(15844)&nbsp;=&nbsp;CENTER OF THE TANGENTIAL PERSPECONIC OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC AND 1st JOHNSON-YFF</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (a+b-c)*(a-b+c)*((b^2+c^2)*a^3-(b+c)^3*a^2-(b^2+c^2)*(b+c)^2*a+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c))  :  :  <p>X(15844) lies on these lines: {1,6831}, {2,12}, {5,226}, {7,2476}, {11,938}, {55,6836}, {57,442}, {65,2886}, {73,5718}, {78,5252}, {85,325}, {119,6918}, {225,3666}, {227,5530}, {377,1466}, {411,7354}, {427,1426}, {495,1385}, {498,7742}, {936,9578}, {943,6903}, {946,15845}, {950,8727}, {1056,6956}, {1400,5742}, {1445,3826}, {1446,3665}, {1478,3149}, {1532,9612}, {1617,10198}, {1708,5791}, {1788,3925}, {2099,3813}, {3085,6865}, {3086,6855}, {3304,6860}, {3338,5290}, {3476,5703}, {3487,6830}, {3488,6845}, {3614,4860}, {3649,10129}, {3660,3814}, {3816,11281}, {3822,4298}, {3911,8728}, {4187,5219}, {4193,5226}, {4197,5435}, {4292,6907}, {4293,6988}, {5173,10916}, {5225,7965}, {5432,6986}, {5714,6941}, {5722,6841}, {5787,10393}, {5842,11507}, {6245,10391}, {6284,6895}, {6835,10895}, {6864,10590}, {6870,10896}, {6882,11374}, {6919,8232}, {6962,9657}, {7308,11869}, {7681,12047}, {7958,10589}, {8226,9581}, {10523,13407}, {10629,10894}</p>
<p>
X(15844) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (495, 6922, 13411), (938, 6828, 11), (2099, 10957, 3813), (5261, 11681, 12)<br>
